title: Manage Underground Ventilation on Demand
description: An underground mine operator uses a Ventilation on Demand (VOD) system to adjust fan speeds based on where people and equipment are working.

tasks.description: The VOD system detects that a diesel loader has entered a previously empty section of the mine.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system automatically identifies the need for more ventilation in that area.

tasks.description: The system automatically sends a command to increase the speed of the auxiliary fan that supplies air to that section.
tasks.expected_outcome: The fan speed is increased to ensure air quality is maintained for the loader operator.

tasks.description: After the loader leaves the area, the system automatically reduces the fan speed to save energy.
tasks.expected_outcome: The fan speed is reduced, minimizing power consumption without compromising safety.
